node.title: Beat Diabetes, Prediabetes, & Overweight - Part 1
node.description: Many people are stuck in “survival mode.” In this series, you will learn how to move your lifestyle and mindset from survival to maintenance, maintenance to success, and success to significance. Discover powerful, practical, personal tools that fight obesity and can prevent, slow, and even reverse diabetes and pre-diabetes. In this exciting and powerful 5-session series, we will help you discover and apply easy steps for improving physical, mental and spiritual health. When it comes to building a better brain, better habits, and a better life—Lifestyle Matters!
